Data Fields
bootloader_writepage_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Bootloader Access

See details below. More...

#include <bootloader.h>

Detailed Description

This structure is used for writing data to the bootloader flash using I_BOOTLOADER_WRITEPAGE.

Data Fields

u32 addr
 The address to write to.
 
u32 nbyte
 The number of bytes to write.
 
u8 buf [BOOTLOADER_WRITEPAGESIZE]
 A buffer for writing to the flash.
